can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
China Securities Regulatory Commission (CSRC)/abbr. for 中國證券監督管理委員會|中国证券监督管理委员会

sentences.english: The CSRC would "adjust the size and pace" of flotations while the pilot was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 证监会将在试点期间，调整浮选的规模和节奏。

sentences.english: All allegations above by the OSC have not been proven.
sentences.chinese: 安省证监会的以上指控尚未被证实。

sentences.english: However, Hong Kong Securities Supervisory Association has not announced 3 activity designators .
sentences.chinese: 不过，香港证监会并没有公布3家机构名称。

sentences.english: The PCCW case was one of the SFC's highest-profile interventions.
sentences.chinese: 电讯盈科案是香港证监会最高调介入的案例之一。

sentences.english: Mr. Shang had been the head of the China Securities Regulatory Commission.
sentences.chinese: 尚先生以前是中国证监会主席。

sentences.english: Two SFC e-Certificates will generally be issued to each licensed corporation.
sentences.chinese: 每家持牌法团一般会获发兩张证监会电子证书。

sentences.english: Three and is also the responsibility of the SFC , and the ultimate goal of the mission.
sentences.chinese: 也是证监会的责任，该特派团的最终目标。

sentences.english: The OSC allegations have not been proven in court.
sentences.chinese: 证监会的这些指控尚未得到法庭证实。

sentences.english: Prospectuses prepared by the Company shall comply with the relevant provisions of the CSRC.
sentences.chinese: 公司编制招股说明书应当符合中国证监会的相关规定。

sentences.english: To do the things you have to comply with the requirements of the SFC .
sentences.chinese: 要做到的事情你必须遵守证监会的要求。

sentences.english: The SFC takes no responsibility as to the contents of this Term Sheet.
sentences.chinese: 证监会对本条款单张所载容概不负责。
